\LA{}Categorical data~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}}\RA{}

\LA{}Convert a categorical feature to a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}}\RA{}
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-2uGgwe-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{10}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{11}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}}}\moddef{Categorical data~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW1QSC6F-1u3Ae3-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{cat{\_}data}}{cat:undata}{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}\nwlinkedidentc{cat_data}{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1} = \nwlinkedidentc{array}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1}([
    'male', 'female', 'male', 'male',
    'female', 'male', 'female', 'female'
])
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-1u3Ae3-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{cat{\_}data}}{cat:undata}}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{array}}{array}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{array}}{array}{NW1QSC6F-LNNak-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{12}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{13}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}}}\moddef{Convert a categorical feature to a number~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW1QSC6F-1u3Ae3-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{cat{\_}to{\_}num}}{cat:unto:unnum}{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}def \nwlinkedidentc{cat_to_num}{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}(data):
    categories = \nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1}(data)
    features = []
    for cat in categories:
        binary = (data == cat)
        features.append(binary.astype("int"))
    return features
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-1u3Ae3-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{cat{\_}to{\_}num}}{cat:unto:unnum}}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{unique}}{unique}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{unique}}{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{14}\nwdocspar

\subsection{Titanic Example (feature extraction)}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{15}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}}\moddef{Titanic example~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW1QSC6F-2uGgwe-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}Titanic data~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}}\RA{}

\LA{}Titanic cabin feature extraction~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}}\RA{}
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-2uGgwe-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{16}\nwdocspar

\todo[inline]{Import from code/data/titanic.csv}
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}}}\moddef{Titanic data~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{cabin{\_}data}}{cabin:undata}{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}\nwlinkedidentc{cabin_data}{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1} = \nwlinkedidentc{array}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1}(["C65", "", "E36", "C54", "B57 B59 B63 B66"])
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{cabin{\_}data}}{cabin:undata}}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{array}}{array}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{array}}{array}{NW1QSC6F-4A9935-1}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{18}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{19}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}}}\moddef{Titanic cabin feature extraction~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{{\_}cabin{\_}char}}{:uncabin:unchar}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}def \nwlinkedidentc{_cabin_char}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}(cabins):
    try:
        return len(cabins), cabins[0][0]
    except IndexError:
        return 0, "X"

\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{{\_}cabin{\_}num}}{:uncabin:unnum}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}def \nwlinkedidentc{_cabin_num}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}(cabins):
    try:
        return int(cabins[0][1:])
    except:
        return -1

\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{cabin{\_}features}}{cabin:unfeatures}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}def \nwlinkedidentc{cabin_features}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}(data):
    features = []
    for cabin in data:
        cabins = cabin.split(" ")
        n_cabins, cabin_char = \nwlinkedidentc{_cabin_char}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}(cabins)
        cabin_num = \nwlinkedidentc{_cabin_num}{NW1QSC6F-2tUzMM-1}(cabins)
        features.append([cabin_char, cabin_num, n_cabins])
    return features
\nwused{\\{NW1QSC6F-1a2VXK-1}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{{\_}cabin{\_}char}}{:uncabin:unchar}}\\{{\nwixident{{\_}cabin{\_}num}}{:uncabin:unnum}}\\{{\nwixident{cabin{\_}features}}{cabin:unfeatures}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{20}\nwdocspar

\subsection{Idris Port}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{21}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}}}\moddef{Data.ML.Categorical~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
-- --------------------------------------------------------- [ Categorical.idr ]

module \nwlinkedidentc{Data.ML.Categorical}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}

import public \nwlinkedidentc{Data.ML.Util}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}

%access export


\nwlinkedidentc{catToNum}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1} : (Num n, Cast Bool n, Ord a) => List a -> List (List n)
\nwlinkedidentc{catToNum}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1} xs = [ cast . (== cat) <$> xs | cat <- \nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1} xs ]

-- --------------------------------------------------------------------- [ EOF ]
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{Data.ML.Categorical}}{Data.ML.Categorical}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}\eatline

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{23}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}}}\moddef{Data.ML.Util~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
-- ---------------------------------------------------------------- [ Util.idr ]

module \nwlinkedidentc{Data.ML.Util}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}

%access public export


||| Convert a Bool to an Integer, as in C99's <stdbool.h>.
||| @ bool a Bool to convert
\nwlinkedidentc{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1} : (bool : Bool) -> Integer
\nwlinkedidentc{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1} False = 0
\nwlinkedidentc{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1} True  = 1


\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{boolToInteger}}{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}||| Cast Bools to Integers via \nwlinkedidentc{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}`.
implementation Cast Bool Integer where
  cast = \nwlinkedidentc{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}


\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{numpy}}{numpy}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}||| Simplified clone of \nwlinkedidentc{numpy}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}.\nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1}`.
|||
||| Return the sorted \nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1} elements of a list.
|||
||| ```
||| \nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1} = sort . nub
||| ```
\nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1} : Ord a => List a -> List a
\nwlinkedidentc{unique}{NW1QSC6F-4ZpoFr-1} = sort . nub

-- --------------------------------------------------------------------- [ EOF ]
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{Data.ML.Util}}{Data.ML.Util}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}\eatline
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{boolToInteger}}{boolToInteger}{NW1QSC6F-3VTH7g-1}\eatline

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{25}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}}}\moddef{Data.ML.Example~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
-- ------------------------------------------------------------- [ Example.idr ]

module \nwlinkedidentc{Data.ML.Example}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}

import public \nwlinkedidentc{Data.ML.Categorical}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1}

%access public export


-- --------------------------------------------- [ Categorical Feature Example ]

namespace Categorical

  exampleData : List String
  exampleData = [ "male",   "female", "male",   "male"
                , "female", "male",   "female", "female"
                ]


\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}  ||| \nwlinkedidentc{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1} example
  ||| \nwlinkedidentc{catToNum}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1} \nwlinkedidentc{Categorical.exampleData}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}
  ||| ```
  example : List (List Integer)
  example = \nwlinkedidentc{catToNum}{NW1QSC6F-2CSwLQ-1} \nwlinkedidentc{Categorical.exampleData}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}


-- --------------------------------------------------------- [ Titanic Example ]

namespace Titanic

  exampleData : List String
  exampleData = [ "C65", "", "E36", "C54", "B57 B59 B63 B66" ]


  -- TODO: record CabinFeature where

\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{idris}}{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}  ||| \nwlinkedidentc{idris}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1} example
  ||| \nwlinkedidentc{Titanic.example}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}
  ||| ```
  example : List (Char, Integer, Nat)
  example = go . words <$> \nwlinkedidentc{Titanic.exampleData}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}
    where
      go : List String -> (Char, Integer, Nat)
      go []                                            = ('X', -1, 0)
      go (cabin :: cabins) with (strM cabin)
        go (""            :: cabins) | StrNil          = ('X', -1, 0)
        go (strCons c num :: cabins) | (StrCons c num) =
           ( c
           , cast num
           , S (length cabins)
           )

-- --------------------------------------------------------------------- [ EOF ]

\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{Titanic.exampleData}}{Titanic.exampleData}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\eatline
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{Titanic.example}}{Titanic.example}{NW1QSC6F-1OmOFW-1}\eatline

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{27}\sublabel{NW1QSC6F-2nK85z-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2nK85z-1}}}\moddef{ipkg~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW1QSC6F-2nK85z-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup

\nwixlogsorted{c}{{Convert a categorical feature to a number}{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}{\nwixu{NW1QSC6F-1u3Ae3-1}\nwixd{NW1QSC6F-4GcJUR-1}}}%
